Update character variables

Source: R/fn_update.R
update_character_vars.Rd

update_character_vars() is an Update function that edits an object, while preserving core object attributes. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to update character variables. The function returns Dataset (a tibble).

Usage

update_character_vars(
  ds_tb,
  var_nms_chr,
  as_missing_chr = character(0),
  missing_1L_chr = NA_character_,
  prefix_1L_chr = character(0),
  remove_end_chr = character(0),
  remove_start_chr = character(0),
  replacement_fn_ls = list(end = stringi::stri_replace_last_fixed, start =
    stringi::stri_replace_first_fixed),
  x_ready4show_correspondences = ready4show::ready4show_correspondences()
)

Arguments

ds_tb

Dataset (a tibble)

var_nms_chr

Variable names (a character vector)

as_missing_chr

As missing (a character vector), Default: character(0)

missing_1L_chr

Missing (a character vector of length one), Default: 'NA'

prefix_1L_chr

Prefix (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

remove_end_chr

Remove end (a character vector), Default: character(0)

remove_start_chr

Remove start (a character vector), Default: character(0)

replacement_fn_ls

Replacement (a list of functions), Default: list(end = stringi::stri_replace_last_fixed, start = stringi::stri_replace_first_fixed)

x_ready4show_correspondences

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: ready4show::ready4show_correspondences()

Value

Dataset (a tibble)
